name: Snõõper
description: '''Snõõper''' is an American [[punk rock]] band formed in [[Nashville]], [[Tennessee]] in 2020. The band consists of vocalist Blair Tramel, guitarists Connor Cummins and Ian Teeple, bassist Happy Haugen and drummer Cam Sarrett. The band released their debut [[studio album]] ''[[Super Snõõper]]'' in July 2023, which was met with positive reception. Due to their non-serious nature, their music is often described as [[egg punk]]. They are known for their large [[papier-mâché]] puppets at their shows, including their mascot, a large green bug.
